00073 void EnterImpHomePage( void )
00074 {
00075    // upon entry to Imp home page
00076    memset(pPlayerActivationString, 0, sizeof(pPlayerActivationString));
00077    
00078        // reset string position
00079        iStringPos =0;
00080 
00081        // reset activation  cursor position
00082    uiCursorPosition = IMP_PLAYER_ACTIVATION_STRING_X;
00083 
00084        // load buttons
00085    CreateIMPHomePageButtons( );
00086 
00087        // we have now vsisited IMP, reset fact we haven't
00088        fNotVistedImpYet = FALSE;
00089        
00090        // render screen once
00091        RenderImpHomePage( );
00092    return;
00093 }

00095 void RenderImpHomePage( void )
00096 {
00097   // the background
00098       RenderProfileBackGround( );
00099   
00100       // the IMP symbol
00101       RenderIMPSymbol( 107, 45 );
00102       
00103   // the second button image
00104       RenderButton2Image( 134, 314);
00105 
00106       // render the indents
00107   
00108       //activation indents
00109       RenderActivationIndent( 257, 328 );
00110 
00111       // the two font page indents
00112       RenderFrontPageIndent( 3, 64 );
00113   RenderFrontPageIndent( 396,64 );
00114 
00115       
00116       // render the  activation string
00117       DisplayPlayerActivationString( );
00118 
00119       
00120       return;
00121 }

00133 void HandleImpHomePage( void )
00134 {
00135 
00136       // handle keyboard input for this screen
00137   GetPlayerKeyBoardInputForIMPHomePage( );
00138 
00139       // has a new char been added to activation string
00140   if( fNewCharInActivationString )
00141       {
00142             // display string 
00143     DisplayPlayerActivationString( );                       
00144       }
00145 
00146       // render the cursor
00147       DisplayActivationStringCursor( );
00148 
00149   return;
00150 }

00152 void DisplayPlayerActivationString( void )
00153 {
00154 
00155       // this function will grab the string that the player will enter for activation
00156   INT32 iCounter=0;
00157 
00158       // player gone too far, move back
00159       if(iStringPos > 64)
00160       {
00161             iStringPos = 64;
00162       }
00163 
00164       // restore background
00165       RenderActivationIndent( 257, 328 );
00166 
00167   // setup the font stuff
00168       SetFont( FONT14ARIAL );
00169   SetFontForeground( 184 );
00170       SetFontBackground(FONT_BLACK);
00171 
00172 
00173   // reset shadow
00174       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);      
00175   mprintf(IMP_PLAYER_ACTIVATION_STRING_X, IMP_PLAYER_ACTIVATION_STRING_Y, pPlayerActivationString); 
00176   
00177       
00178       fNewCharInActivationString = FALSE;
00179   fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00180       return;
00181 }

00184 void DisplayActivationStringCursor( void )
00185 {
00186       // this procdure will draw the activation string cursor on the screen at position cursorx cursory
00187   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00188       static UINT32 uiBaseTime = 0;
00189       UINT32 uiDeltaTime = 0;
00190       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00191   static UINT32 iCurrentState = 0;
00192   static BOOLEAN fIncrement = TRUE;
00193 
00194       if(uiBaseTime == 0)
00195       {
00196             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
00197       }
00198       
00199       // get difference
00200       uiDeltaTime = GetJA2Clock() - uiBaseTime;
00201 
00202       // if difference is long enough, rotate colors
00203       if(uiDeltaTime > MIN_GLOW_DELTA)
00204   {
00205             if( iCurrentState == 10)
00206             {
00207               // start rotating downward
00208                   fIncrement = FALSE;
00209             }
00210             if( iCurrentState == 0)
00211             {
00212                   // rotate colors upward
00213                   fIncrement = TRUE;
00214             }
00215             // if increment upward, increment iCurrentState
00216     if(fIncrement)
00217             {
00218                   iCurrentState++;
00219             }
00220             else
00221             {
00222                   // else downwards
00223                   iCurrentState--;
00224             }
00225         // reset basetime to current clock
00226             uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00227       }
00228 
00229       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
00230       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00231 
00232 
00233   // draw line in current state
00234       LineDraw(TRUE, (UINT16) uiCursorPosition, CURSOR_Y, (UINT16)uiCursorPosition, CURSOR_Y + CURSOR_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 0 ], GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 1 ], GlowColorsList[ iCurrentState ][ 2 ] ) ), 
00235                pDestBuf );
00236       
00237       // unlock frame buffer
00238       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00239 
00240   InvalidateRegion((UINT16) uiCursorPosition , CURSOR_Y , (UINT16)uiCursorPosition + 1, CURSOR_Y + CURSOR_HEIGHT + 1);
00241  
00242       
00243       return;
00244 }

00248 void GetPlayerKeyBoardInputForIMPHomePage( void )
00249 {
00250       InputAtom                           InputEvent;
00251       POINT  MousePos;
00252 
00253       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
00254 
00255   while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
00256   {
00257             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
00258             /*
00259             switch(InputEvent.usEvent)
00260         {
00261                   case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00262                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00263                         break;
00264                   case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
00265                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00266                         break;
00267                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00268                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00269                         break;
00270                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
00271                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00272                         break;
00273         }
00274 */
00275             if(   !HandleTextInput( &InputEvent ) && (InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN || InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_REPEAT || InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP ) )
00276             {
00277               switch( InputEvent.usParam )
00278                   {
00279                     case (( ENTER ) ):
00280                               if(( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_UP ) )
00281                               {
00282                                     // return hit, check to see if current player activation string is a valid one 
00283                                     ProcessPlayerInputActivationString( );
00284               
00285                                 fNewCharInActivationString = TRUE;
00286                               }
00287                         break;
00288                         case (( ESC )):
00289           LeaveLapTopScreen( );
00290                         break;
00291                         default:
00292                               if(InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN || InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_REPEAT )
00293                               {
00294                                     HandleTextEvent( InputEvent.usParam );
00295                               }
00296                         break;
00297                   }
00298             }
00299       }
00300 
00301       return;
00302 }
00303 
00304 
00305 void HandleTextEvent( UINT32 uiKey )
00306 {
00307    // this function checks to see if a letter or a backspace was pressed, if so, either put char to screen
00308        // or delete it
00309 
00310   switch( uiKey )
00311       {
00312         case ( BACKSPACE ): 
00313             
00314                   if( iStringPos >= 0 )
00315                   {
00316 
00317                         if( iStringPos > 0 )
00318                         {
00319                               // decrement iStringPosition
00320                               iStringPos-=1;
00321                         }
00322                         
00323                         // null out char
00324         pPlayerActivationString[iStringPos ] = 0;
00325         
00326                         // move back cursor
00327         uiCursorPosition = StringPixLength( pPlayerActivationString, FONT14ARIAL ) + IMP_PLAYER_ACTIVATION_STRING_X;
00328           
00329                   
00330 
00331                         // string has been altered, redisplay
00332         fNewCharInActivationString = TRUE;
00333                         
00334       }
00335 
00336             break;
00337 
00338         default:
00339           if( uiKey >= 'A' && uiKey <= 'Z' || 
00340                               uiKey >= 'a' && uiKey <= 'z' ||
00341                               uiKey >= '0' && uiKey <= '9' ||
00342                               uiKey == '_' || uiKey == '.' )
00343                   { 
00344                         // if the current string position is at max or great, do nothing
00345         if( iStringPos >= 8 )
00346         {
00347                               break;
00348                         }
00349                         else
00350                         {
00351                               if(iStringPos < 0 )
00352                               {
00353                                     iStringPos = 0;
00354                               }
00355           // valid char, capture and convert to CHAR16
00356           pPlayerActivationString[iStringPos] = ( CHAR16 )uiKey;
00357                               
00358                               // null out next char position
00359                               pPlayerActivationString[iStringPos + 1] = 0;
00360           
00361                               // move cursor position ahead
00362           uiCursorPosition = StringPixLength( pPlayerActivationString, FONT14ARIAL ) + IMP_PLAYER_ACTIVATION_STRING_X;
00363           
00364                               // increment string position
00365                               iStringPos +=1;
00366                         
00367                           // string has been altered, redisplay
00368           fNewCharInActivationString = TRUE;
00369 
00370                         }
00371 
00372                   }
00373 
00374             break;
00375             
00376       }
00377 
00378 
00379       return;
00380 }

00382 
00383 void ProcessPlayerInputActivationString( void )
00384 {
00385   // prcess string to see if it matches activation string
00386 
00387       if( NumberOfMercsOnPlayerTeam() >= 18 )         
00388             return;
00389 
00390       char charPlayerActivationString[32];
00391       wcstombs(charPlayerActivationString,pPlayerActivationString,32);
00392 
00393 //Madd multiple imps if( ( ( wcscmp(pPlayerActivationString, L"XEP624") == 0 ) || ( wcscmp(pPlayerActivationString, L"xep624") == 0 ) )&&( LaptopSaveInfo.fIMPCompletedFlag == FALSE ) &&( LaptopSaveInfo.gfNewGameLaptop < 2 ) )
00394   if( ( ( wcscmp(pPlayerActivationString, L"XEP624") == 0 ) || ( wcscmp(pPlayerActivationString, L"xep624") == 0 ) ) &&( LaptopSaveInfo.gfNewGameLaptop < 2 ) )
00395       {
00396             // Kaiden: Need to reset skills, attributes and personalities with the new UB Method.
00397             ResetSkillsAttributesAndPersonality( );
00398             ClearAllSkillsList( );
00399         iCurrentImpPage = IMP_MAIN_PAGE;
00400       
00401       }
00402       //Madd multiple imps else if( ( wcscmp(pPlayerActivationString, L"90210") == 0 ) && ( LaptopSaveInfo.fIMPCompletedFlag == FALSE ) )
00403       else if( wcscmp(pPlayerActivationString, L"90210") == 0 )
00404       {
00405             LoadImpCharacter( IMP_MERC_FILENAME );
00406       }
00407       // Madd: load characters by name
00408       else if ( ImpExists( charPlayerActivationString ) )
00409       {
00410             LoadImpCharacter( charPlayerActivationString );
00411       }
00412 
00413       else
00414   {
00415             if( ( ( wcscmp(pPlayerActivationString, L"XEP624") != 0 ) && ( wcscmp(pPlayerActivationString, L"xep624") != 0 ) ) )
00416             {
00417                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_IMP_STYLE, pImpPopUpStrings[ 0 ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
00418             }
00419             else if( LaptopSaveInfo.fIMPCompletedFlag == TRUE )
00420             {
00421                DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_IMP_STYLE, pImpPopUpStrings[ 6 ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
00422             }
00423             
00424             
00425       }
00426       return;
00427 }

00438                                                             BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST - 1,
00439                                                             BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAboutUsCallback);
00440   */
00441       
00442       giIMPHomePageButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( giIMPHomePageButtonImage[0], pImpButtonText[ 0 ], FONT12ARIAL, 
00443                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00444                                                                                      FONT_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00445                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00446                                                                                      LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X +  ( 286 - 106 ), LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + ( 248 - 48), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00447                                                                                           BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallback, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnIMPAboutUsCallback);
00448 
00449 
00450       SetButtonCursor(giIMPHomePageButton[ 0 ], CURSOR_WWW);
00451       
00452       return;

00471 void BtnIMPAboutUsCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00472 {
00473 
00474       // btn callback for IMP Homepage About US button
00475       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00476             return;
00477 
00478       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00479       {
00480              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00481       }
00482       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00483       {
00484             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00485             {
00486       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00487       iCurrentImpPage = IMP_ABOUT_US;
00488                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00489             }
00490       }     
00491 }
